channel.title: Exorcism 742 - Brand New!
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Exorcism is a Brand New Server with 100% uptime with lots of content and Daily Updates![/size]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://exorcism.createaforum.com/index.php?action=forum]Forums[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img] [url=http://exorcism.createaforum.com/index.php]Homepage[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://exorcism.comlu.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://uppit.com/q4myrrs3u5uw/Exorcism.jar]Download Client[/url]
Here are some features
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/28sy3hc.jpg[/img] [SIZE=3]732 items Lots of Updates In Game View Stats Fully Working Prestige System With 5 Prestiges to do! Great Economy Lots of Bosses 99.9% Specs including Korasi Lucky item specs and bonuses Squeal of fortune Loyalty Point Shop Fist of Guthix Point shop In Game currency[/SIZE]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/xf9un6.jpg[/img] [SIZE=3]- Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Nex armour 100% working - Fantastic Staff - Opening Support Team Shortly
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Barrows & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - custom maps - donorzones staffzones and more
Armours/Bosses: - All new 732 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now[/SIZE]
Home [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/bi00tl.png[/img]
Working Squeal [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/5v2cxy.png[/img]
Working Money Pouch [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/5vspdu.jpg[/img]
Lots of Shops [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/wb8hub.jpg[/img]
World Messages [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1hrmkz.png[/img]
22/25 Working Skills [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/w1xr4m.png[/img]
In Game View Stats [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/148ogph.jpg[/img]
Fully Working Prestige System! [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/14y97qo.jpg[/img]
All these Minigames Working 100% [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/307m0iq.jpg[/img]
Bones on altar [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/14kuo09.jpg[/img]
Cool Donatorzone tele [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2sbo77d.jpg[/img]
Fist Of Guthix Shop [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2k2cnr.jpg[/img]
Lots of Bosses [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/hsuv6v.jpg[/img]
Lots of Shops [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2nltkw9.jpg[/img]
Lots of Teles [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/k0nkw2.jpg[/img]
Loyalty Shop (More to be added) [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/orusuw.jpg[/img]
Slayer dungeons [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/rj4fn7.jpg[/img]
Ingame Currency (Worth 1M) [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2iia9ee.jpg[/img]
Working Nex Bonuses [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/o5e5jk.jpg[/img]
Working Slayer including cancelling tasks [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ylwxt3.jpg[/img]
Cool Commands like ::dh [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/sdfqqa.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Exorcism 742 - Brand New!
item.dc:creator: @ildarkelly ildarkelly
item.description:
@ildarkelly wrote:

[center][size=14pt]Exorcism is a Brand New Server with 100% uptime with lots of content and Daily Updates![/size]

Forums
Homepage
Webclient
Download Client

Here are some features


[SIZE=3]732 items
Lots of Updates
In Game View Stats
Fully Working Prestige System With 5 Prestiges to do!
Great Economy
Lots of Bosses
99.9% Specs including Korasi
Lucky item specs and bonuses
Squeal of fortune
Loyalty Point Shop
Fist of Guthix Point shop
In Game currency[/SIZE]


[SIZE=3]- Switching is near perfect

  • All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Nex armour 100% working
  • Fantastic Staff
  • Opening Support Team Shortly

(Bosses)

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • 100% Godwars
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Barrows & More…

Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat

  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)

Random Stuff:

  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • music everyone knows that
  • custom maps
  • donorzones staffzones and more

Armours/Bosses:

  • All new 732 armours obv we all know
  • Bosses are upgraded to new looks
  • Jad waves maxed out to 65
  • Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats
  • Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now[/SIZE]
